content: शुद्धिः [शुध्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Purity, cleanness. {@--2@} Brightness, lustre; मुक्तागुणशुद्धयोपि (चंद्रपादाः) <ls>R. 16. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Sanctity, holiness; तीर्थभिषेकजां शुद्धिमादधाना महीक्षितः <ls>R. 1. 85</ls> {@--4@} Purification expiation, atonement, expiatory act; शरीरत्यागमात्रणे शुद्धिलाभममन्यत <ls>R. 12. 10.</ls> {@--5@} A purificatory or expiatory rite. {@--6@} Paying off or clearing (of expenses). {@--7@} Retaliation, requital. {@--8@} Acquittal, innocence (established by trial). {@--9@} Truth, accuracy, correctness. {@--10@} Rectification, correction. {@--11@} Subtraction. {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
